experience.description: Working on Microsoft 365 Productivity Suite to deliver highly scalable products and to provide the best user experiences across all applications in the suite.
Built Docgen - a novel documentation orchestrator for NetApp's ActiveIQ API Reference. Built internal web applications & microservices for sizing NetApp Storage Solutions.
Built scalable microservice backend architectures and reliable Message Queueing Systems for Team-One, a cloud based messaging tool which is now part of WebEx.
